pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, December 12, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Monday, December 12, 2016:

Ottawa, Ontario

11:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability

National Press Theatre
150 Wellington Street
Ottawa, Ontario

 Notes for media:

  • Journalists who are not members of the Canadian Parliamentary Press Gallery will require accreditation from the gallery in advance. For more information, contact Marc Fortier at Marc.fortier@parl.gc.ca
  • Out-of-town journalists can also dial in to listen to the news conference. Please note these will be set up as listen-only mode lines. International callers must dial the local phone number for proper access. Participants can call in at local: 613-960-7527 or toll free: 877-413-4815/ Conference ID: 9302199

PMO Media Relations:
media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
